@SCOANTBJoshua 3. Docs continued with daily monitoring of the situation, many patients with similar situation passed on actually all of them more than 15 patients in number But my dad was saved by the lord Jesus. 

The new anointing water is power and jesus is the answer!

@SCOANTBJoshua 2. Mum recovered at home never admitted at ICU despite the deadly threat by Covid.

Dad's oxygen levels lowered and lowered, he never could walk nor stand, we called ambulance and he was directly taken to ICU. We continued with prayer as family and treatment.

@SCOANTBJoshua My mum & Dad had Covid-19, Dad was hospitalized for close to 3 months at ICU God of T.B joshua rescued them.
I asked Mum where she had kept the New anointing water, it's what i sprayed on her with prayer and asking for mercy and forgiveness they got healed. 1
